results.title: Metformin: An Old Drug with New Tricks-Promising Role in Vascular Aging and Cardioprotection.
results.text_hl: Besides, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@-lowering and antiinflammatory activity, which is critical for reducing @<m>DISEASE_Muscle_Rigidity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009127 @@@arterial rigidity@@@ and the development of @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherosclerotic@@@ plaque.
